resources.string:
This Application get Football Matches Score for the Premier League, Seria A, Bundesliga, Primera Division and the Uefa Champions League. All Matches data are acquired from football-data.org free API. All team logos are acquired from http://hdlogo.wordpress.com/ upon requesting permission from the owner. The original version of this app was created by Yahia Khalid Ibn El Walid Ahmed, and a modified version is given to students in the Udacity Android Nanodegree program. To report any bugs, or suggestions do not hesitate to send a mail to y.k.ibnelwalid@gmail.com.
During the off season, fake data will be added to the app.
